Articles.Content: What? Being a mod author? Cheater! Everyone knows that mods are HAAXXXX!!!111!11!!1
Being the thread OP? Hardly fair if you get the first word in, cheater. All the rest of us have replied only, without that unfair advantage.
Pff. Calling OPness cheating? Cheater! You've started many a thread! HYPOCRISY! Real players are never hypocrites!
Co-Leading? Cheetah!

600 hours of KSP?

CHEATER!
Yet another person not following the rules of this game? Cheater! Real players always follow rules if they are going to participate!
You follow rules? Cheater! Real-REAL players don't follow rules!

Ignoring rules? I must consider you a dirty cheater, my friend. Fair players not only follow the rules but pounce on the most minor violations of them. To help cheaters learn, of course. Totally not to feel superior.
Agreeing with me? Chea-wait. actually. no you're good on that one. However, calling someone a dirty cheater, and then addressing them as your friend? Cheater! Real players are never confusing.
Being a self-centered endermen? CHEATER! Real players are always generous, like the concept (NOT PRACTICE) of communism. you should always be at my location too, by the way.
Generosity? That's the cheater's way to go. Pros make sure everyone earns what they get.

Not favoring generosity? CHEATER! Real players always love and tolerate.

Wait a minute. OH NOES, I'VE BEEN INFECTED WITH THE BRONY VIRUS! *suicides*
Suicide? That's the easy way out, cheater. Real players pick fights until someone kills them the old fashioned way.

Not using guns? CHEATER! Real players ALWAYS use AK-47's to kill people.

Oh and by the way, everybody who reads this just lost The Game.

Edited June 20, 2014 by Souper

Not using guns? CHEATER! Real players ALWAYS use AK-47's to kill people.

Oh and by the way, everybody who reads this just lost The Game.

Nope, because I cheated and changed my background color to the same color as that text. So I don't know what you said.
You changed your background to that colour? Cheater pumpkin... eater!? Reel players NEVER mod their forum color!
You created a new page with that post?! Cheater!
You are saying someone is making a new page with a post, Thats not cheating you are! CHEATER!
You're not typing those words with the bayonet of a bolt-action handgun! U IS A CHEATER!
Saying "U" instead of "you"? Cheater! Real plyrs nvr use shrtcts.
Being hypocritical? CHEATER!!!!!!!!
Animated gif for a signature? Rarely have I seen such a clear cut case of cheating. Good posters' sigs are text only.

Yeah! What he said!

However, i can sense that you said "gif" and pronounced it "gif" instead of pronouncing it correctly, "jif" Which is cheating! CHEATING I TELL YOU!!!!! Non-cheaters always pronounce stuff right!
CApital I for when you are talking about yourself! CHEATER!

Only cheaters capitalize two letters in the first word of the sentence. One capital is enough for us fair players.

Also, I say "jif".
